name: Sweet Scent
description: You release a sweet smell directed at a target in range. The target must make a CHA save against your Move DC. On a fail, you have advantage on your next two attacks against that target.
optional: Change range to 10ft radius circle centered up to 20ft away. All allies gain the benefit of having advantage against the targets.

contest.effect: Prevents the user from being startled one time this turn.
